type.description:
## Health

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/health)

Checks the current health value of the entity.

Type ID: `origins:health`

---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:health",
    "comparison": "<",
    "compare_to": 20
}
```

This example will check if the entity's health is less than 10 hearts (or 20 health points).
